Description:
Detects suspicious Spring framework exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

Author: Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Spring Framework Exceptions
Query: sourcetype like 'spring-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%accessdeniedexception%' or log like '%csrfexception%' or log like '%invalidcsrftokenexception%' or log like '%missingcsrftokenexception%' or log like '%cookietheftexception%' or log like '%invalidcookieexception%' or log like '%requestrejectedexception%')
